text: Matawa anata ga, kogane (no soshoku) no ie o mochi,(hashigo o funde) ten ni noboru made wa. Iya, watashi-tachi ni yomeru keiten o motte kudaru made, anata no shoten o mo shinjinaidearou.' Itte yaru ga i. `Omo ni tatae are, watashi wa shito to shite (noko wa sa reta) hitori no ningen nisuginaide wanai ka
